ShortDescription.Value: A WriteEverywhere-Module that replaces Vanilla Signs with Polish ones.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Polish Vanilla Theme Overrider
Hello and Hallo. This is a **EU** and **NA** Vanilla Theme Overrider that turns Vanilla Signs, Roadmarkings and Decals to Polish ones.
## Functions - Works **automaticly**, you don't need any knowledge whatsoever! - Dynamic working Street Signs - Dynamic working Bus/Tram Signs with max. 7 Lines displayed - Bicycle Parking Spots - 3D Model Signs
---
## Requirements - [Write Everywhere](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/92908/Windows) â€“ required
---
## Check out the other Country Packs/Overrider - [Other Countries](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/authors/UnMaestro)
---
## Credits and Special Thanks - To **Klyte45** for the WriteEverywhere mod. - **Klyte45**s [Vanilla Theme Override Mod](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/106877/Windows), without that I would have lost my mind.
---
## Enjoy & Share Your Feedback!
